PVLib

Class PVPersistentField

  • java.lang.Object
    • PVLib.PVPersistentField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PVActive

    public abstract class PVPersistentField
extends java.lang.Object
implements PVActive
    This is an abstract class. It uses the Active interface, but not the Graphical. The class could use Graphical if there is an image or animation associated with the field. However it is recommended not to use the Graphical interface.
    Author:
    John
